name: LinkCentral
author: Design for WP

sections.description:
LinkCentral is your all-in-one WordPress solution for URL mastery. Create short links, manage affiliate links, and track link performance with ease. From custom slugs to advanced analytics, LinkCentral is packed with features for marketers and bloggers. Seamlessly integrate with Gutenberg or other editors, and see how your links perform using our built-in insights and Google Analytics 4 integration.

Features

🔗 Custom URL Shortening: Create short, clean, memorable URLs. Customize with prefixes and slugs, such as www.yourdomain.com/go/your-custom-slug.

🔍 Advanced Link Tracking: Track clicks and gather detailed insights on link performance.

💼 Affiliate Link Management: Cloak and manage your affiliate links while staying organized with categories and private notes.

🧩 Flexible Integrations: Easily insert links using our built-in integrations with common page builders or use shortcodes.

📊 Google Analytics 4 Support: Send link tracking data to Google Analytics 4.

🔄 Redirection Settings: Choose redirection types (301, 302, 307), add nofollow and sponsored attributes, and more.

⏰ Plan Redirects Ahead: Schedule and manage future redirects.

🔒 Password-Protected Redirects: Secure your redirects with passwords.

🚀 Optimized and Lightweight: Built with performance in mind, using native WordPress integration for speed without bloat.

🔌 WordPress-Friendly: Utilizes a custom post type for seamless integration into the WordPress ecosystem.

AND MUCH MORE: 🛡️ GDPR Compliance, 🧹 Data Expiry, 🤖 IP and bots exclusion, we have it all, for free!

Learn more about everything LinkCentral has to offer.

Integrate with Ease 🪢

LinkCentral integrates with the most popular plugins and page builders! Insert all your links with ease:

  • Elementor (Free and Pro)
  • Gutenberg
  • Classic Editor (TinyMCE)
  • Beaver Builder
  • and more…

More Features with LinkCentral Premium ⭐

Unlock the full potential of LinkCentral with our premium features.

📈 Link-Specific Insights: Get detailed analytics for individual links.

🔄 Parameter Forwarding: Enable parameter forwarding.

🎨 Custom styling: Add CSS classes to your links.

♾️ Access to Updates: Enjoy access to future updates.

🤝 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee: Purchase with confidence with our 30-day money-back guarantee.

See all Premium features

Privacy 🛡️

Tracking

LinkCentral is built with privacy in mind. In our plugin settings, we give you full control over whether and how to track your users’ data. LinkCentral supports detailed tracking, but also offers options for anonymizing data or opting out of all tracking.

3rd Party Services

  • Google Analytics 4: When enabled in the plugin settings, LinkCentral can send your analytics data directly to Google Analytics 4. Read more about Google’s Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
  • Design for WP: If you activate LinkCentral Premium, the plugin may periodically validate your license with our server. No data except for the license key will be transmitted. Learn more in our TOS and Privacy Policy.
sections.installation:
Easy installation

  1. Go to the Add New Plugin page in your WordPress admin.
  2. Search for “LinkCentral” and select the plugin from the results.
  3. Install the plugin and activate it.
  4. Detailed instructions on how to use LinkCentral can be found under Settings -> Usage.

Advanced installation

  1. Upload the linkcentral folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Detailed instructions on how to use LinkCentral can be found under Settings -> Usage.

short_description: The easiest URL shortener, custom link manager, and link tracking plugin. Fast and optimised for better short links, redirects and affiliate links.

screenshots.caption: LinkCentral Dashboard: Overview of all your custom links.
Create New Links: Easily create and manage custom links with a user-friendly interface.
Insert Links Easily: Use our flexible integrations with Visual Editor, Gutenberg, Elementor, shortcodes and more to insert links in text and buttons.
Link Insights: Detailed analytics and performance tracking.
Comprehensive Settings: Extensive configuration options for link behavior, tracking, integrations, and more.
